definitions.definition: Not bearing children , childless ; hence also unable to bear children, sterile .
examples: I silently wept as my daughter's husband rejected her. What would she do now that she was no longer a maiden but also barren ?
definitions.label_groups: of people and animals , not comparable

definitions.definition: Of poor fertility , infertile ; not producing vegetation ; desert , waste .
Devoid of interest or attraction , poor , bleak .
Unproductive , fruitless , unprofitable ; empty , hollow , vain .
Mentally dull or unproductive; stupid or intellectually fallow .

main_definition: ( of people and animals , not comparable ) Not bearing children , childless ; hence also unable to bear children, sterile .
secondary_definitions: ( of plants , not comparable ) Not bearing seed or fruit .
( of places ) Of poor fertility , infertile ; not producing vegetation ; desert , waste .
Devoid of interest or attraction , poor , bleak .
Unproductive , fruitless , unprofitable ; empty , hollow , vain .
Mentally dull or unproductive; stupid or intellectually fallow .
